attributes.additional_details:
We are a GCSE citizenship group who are trying to stop crime in our local area and help all those who are being terrorised by the crime ratings, which have rocketed sky high.

Sign this petition to give us a chance to fight the crime in our local area.

rejection.details: Thanks for your e-petition and your interest in crime prevention in your area.  Unfortunately, this e-petition cannot be published as it does not include a specific request for action by the government.  You may also wish to be aware that local policing priorities are the responsibility of your Police and Crime Commissioner - John Dwyer, rather than central government.  Your PCC can be contacted at http://www.cheshire-pcc.gov.uk/Home.aspx/
